dmca.title: bikinibikini.com - copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not
identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b)
the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information
reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said
material. 

 

 

Legal Response Team


________________________________

From: kt@kt-so.com [mailto:kt@kt-so.com] 
Sent: Monday, October 02, 2006 9:37 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: bikinibikini.com - copyright violation


It has come to my attention that you of your clients,
www.bikinibikini.com has been violating copyright infringement laws by
providing a place for people to distribute links to my copyrighted work.

 
Katie So, Owner of copyrighted works.
 
contact info:
Katie So
3592 Rosemead blvd, PMB220, Rosemead, ca91770
tel: 805 6372880
email: kt@kt-so.com
 
original location of copyrighted material
www.kt-so.com/members/
 
 
location of works infringed upon, and distributed.
http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread21669.html
 
 
Me Katie So has a good faith belief that use of the material in the
manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its
agents, or the law
 
I, Katie So state that the information in the notice is accurate, under
penalty of perjury.
 
 
Moreover, many of these forum members are underage children. There has
also been a few incidents where beastality videos and even child
pornography were posted!!!
